title: When projective technique is used person asked to

content.prompt: When a projective technique is used, a person could be asked to

choices.label: select statements that she believes best describe her personality
select statements that she believes identify her likes and dislikes
look at some pictures and tell a story about each of them
respond to grade-level questions about math, English, social studies, and science

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
